alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 7:12PM MDT until June 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Corson County in north central South Dakota... Campbell County in north central South Dakota... Northeastern Dewey County in north central South Dakota... Northwestern Walworth County in north central South Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/. * At 812 PM CDT/712 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Lake Oahe, or near Mobridge, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pollock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
